title.rendered: AFN SIDE STEPS + Rails TO SUIT VW AMAROK COMPATIBLE WITH V6 MODELS

content.rendered:
AFN Side Steps to suit VW Amarok, available now at Automax 4×4!

AFN side steps to suit VW Amarok are compatible with V6 models & include:

  • Steel Tube Design
  • Checkered Aluminum Plate Top
  • Matte Black Powder Coated (Tube ONLY)

To browse the full range of 4×4 accessories to suit your VW Amarok click here!

For more 4×4 inspiration follow us on Instagram and Facebook

excerpt.rendered: AFN side steps + rails to suit your VW Amarok (compatible with V6 models) are currently available in store or online at Automax 4×4!
